reviews.review:
I was thinking of playing this again because it was so entertaining but then it struck me...

... future civilizations will reconstruct Half-Life 2: Episode Two from the hard drive of a PC perfectly preserved under the remains of the United States after the Yellowstone Supervolcano explodes, but they will search in vain for years trying to find Episode Three.

And they will never ever find Episode Three and find out what happens to their favorite characters.

And they will NEVER KNOW, did Valve release Episode Three?  Is it simply on another lost hard drive?  Were all hard drives with Episode Three permanently destroyed?

It will be akin to future generations wondering about the lost fragments of the Epic of Gilgamesh.

This made me really depressed and so I cannot bring myself to play this game ever again.

I recommend this game only to people who want to contemplate the nature of man's imperfect knowledge of his own past.

This game is by far one of my all time favorites, Half Life 2 brings a fluent cast of characters without going to slow through the story, with a wonderful enviornment that gives you some amazing views, Half Life 2 is still today a game worth playing over many others and shows us how innovative developers can be, Half Life 2 isnt just an FPS, its an expierience the physics gun alone in the game shows this game is not a regular twitch shooter and should be paid attention to when playing and indulged on, Half Life 2 will forever be place high in the archives of gaming history for years to come.

Buenísimo no, lo siguiente. Todavía puede uno sorprenderse con juegos que no jugó en su momento tras veinticinco años jugando y tragarme tropecientos FPS desde antes de que se llamasen así. Es imperdonable que no jugase antes. Historia chulísima, más si jugaste al primer Half Life, muy equilibrado, entretenidísimo, bonito y por momentos trepidante y con un puntillo de sustos. Vamos, que después de jugar a otros aclamados FPS de última generación con gráficos flarflarflar y texturas florflorflor, se caga en ellos. Y además es que se caga en todos aquellos que dicen que los juegos lineales no tienen futuro frente a los sandbox. Y una mierda: un buen juego aparentemente lineal como el Half Life 2 es entretenido como el mejor Sandbox para mí, pero hay que hacerlo muy muy bien como éste. 10 sobre 10, ¡y todavía tengo que jugar los episodios!

Half Life 2 is not a game, it's a adventure across first-person action,physics puzzles, and a major success for it's time.It's still fun to play because of the great graphics,good A.I(even though it's annoying sometimes),the physics system that allows you to throw random stuff at enemies,and of course good ol' Freeman with his crowbar.The game kinda lacks a storyline, but along the way you'll get to understand the plot and what you're supposed to do.The first game was 2 steps into the franchise,while the second one is 3 steps ahead.The combat is brilliant,The graphics are good,and the characters are somewhat likeable i guess (it could depend though i still think it's good) and just messing around with the Console:).I played the game originally on the Xbox,then pc but i suggest pc since the graphics are better and it's a little bit more fun.Overall i give the game a 9/10 it might not be as good but hey, i think it's pretty fun.

Questo saga è stata la mia preferita nel mondo videoludico, già Half-Life era spettacolare all'epoca e una pietra miliare nel mondo videoludico immaginatevi il 2 com'è. 
Il gioco vi immerge proprio nella storia con misteri, come il personaggio G-Man, per non parlare dei mostri veramente belli e le locations anche, la trama poi è spettacolare che lascia sempre qualcosa nel cuore veramente, non vedo l'ora di giocare al 3° capitolo della saga ossia Half-Life 3. 
La grafica poi l'amo veramente, anche se è molto vecchia è sempre bella da vedere, l'unica pecca del gioco è il doppiaggio italiano veramente fatto malissimo, consiglio di giocarlo inglese con sottotitoli italiani.
E vi parlerà anche dei DLC di Half-Life 2, come al solito sono spettacolari e spiega l'eventi subito dopo la fine di Half Life 2, e la storia viene narrata perfettamente bene.
Consiglio assolutamente il gioco e i DLC perchè questa saga è una delle più belle nel mondo videoludico e non dovete perderla.

Pro:

+ Saga spettacolare
+ Grafica vecchia ma ottima
+ Trama intrigante e stupenda
+ Personaggio carismatico
+ DLC's
+ Doppiaggio Inglese
+ Musiche azzeccate 
+ G-Man
+ Mostri e Locations

Con:

- Doppiaggio Italiano veramente brutto

---------------------------------------------------------------

English

This saga has been my favorite in the world of video games, Half-Life already was spectacular at the time and a milestone in the world of video games imagine the 2 is.
The game plunges you right into the story with mysteries, such as the G-Man character, not to mention the monsters really beautiful and also the locations, the plot is spectacular and that always leaves something in my heart really, I can not wait to play 3rd chapter of the saga that is Half-Life 3.
The graphics then I really love, although it is very old it is always nice to see, the only flaw of the game is the Italian dubbing really done badly, I suggest you to play English with Italian subtitles.
It also tells you about the DLC Half-Life 2, as usual, are spectacular and explains the events immediately after the end of Half Life 2, and the story is told perfectly well.
I would totally recommend the game and the DLC because this saga is one of the most beautiful in the world of video games and do not have to lose it.

Pro:

+ Saga spectacular
+ Graphics Old but good
+ Plot intriguing and beautiful
+ Character Charismatic
+ DLC's
+ English Dubbing
+ Spot on Music
+ G-Man
+ Monsters and Locations

Con:

- Italian dubbing really bad

Great gameplay, although it can be tough sometimes, in the end, the game is good and you should get it. The puzzles are a bit challenging, for example: At times you might get stuck for about 30 minutes, but it's not that often. The storyline is great, models and maps are good, the graphics are well, not perfect, but not bad. Well, it was a game made in 2004, so why would I hate on this? I freaking love this series and wish good luck for the development of the next Half-Life game.
awsome game

A shining beacon of light showing how to do interactive storytelling right. Immersion, atmosphere, pacing, explorable environments, interesting mechanics, action, lovable characters, and even more. The game is $10 even without discounts. There's no excuse to not have played this game by now. If I could go back in time to buy the orange box for my younger self when it first came out, it would be worth everything and more. 
Buy it. Play it. Experience for yourself why so many people still praise this game even now, nearly TEN YEARS after its release.

Half life 2 in my opinion had a great 1st, 2nd and 3rd act but the last run up the Citadel was dissapointing. The entire game revolves around this obilesk like tower that you know you will have to enter eventually, but sadly is devoid of anything that different. There are cool things here and there and yes its visually stunning, but all you really encounter there are more swat teams, one after the other. I was expecting creatures, a whatchdog, a boss battle, nope. All you get is Breen who is protected by a flying thingie we've seen before.

Its a great game, but that ending just wasn't boss enough.
Truly the best game I have ever played, but it stops at such a harid cliffhanger that I do not recommend purchasing it, but because HL2 it self is good I will post a positive comment

Half Life 2 è una pietra miliare nell'ambito videoludico e ancora oggi sorprende per la freschezza delle idee e il gameplay moderno. Un titolo longevo e mai ripetitivo, che racconta gli avvenimenti senza prendere per mano il giocare, ma lasciando che sia lui a ricostruire la storia in base a ciò che accade mentre gioca. Calibrato perfettamente tra fasi esplorative, semplici puzzle ambientali e combattimenti, rimane uno dei titoli che deve necessariamente far parte della cultura videoludica di ogni giocatore.

After reading several reviews of this game, I decided to give it a try. 
This is how my game has gone thus far:

Day 1: 
Downloading was quick and painless, it ran smoothly from the very first time I opened it. Usually, I don't really like FPS, but this has grown on me. I loved how the story progressed as I explored the scenes.

Day 2: (Impressed) This story progression is pretty amazing, I love that there was so much attention to detail and it was also my first time using a vehicle \:D/ 

Day 3: (More impressed) The evolution of the enemies you fight is brilliant and I loved the range of weapons I got to choose from.

Day 4: (In love) The doors are invulnerable. The ooze is radioactive. I can use any weapon I want (including paint tins- which can explode on contact). I've had a jeep. I've had minions. More general badassery ensues. 

Day 5: (Happily married) Everyone should play this game. At least once.

Sin duda es una compra segura y como muchos esperamos, que salga Half-Life 3 para continuar con la Historia <3

Just finished this game for the third time over, this time a little different I played through this time entirely in the Oculus Rift VR mode.... and to say it was amazing is an understatement. absolutely amazing.... everything you seen the first time going through this game is amped up on steroids. There are a few scenes, 2-3 in the entire game that make the 3D perspective go alittle wonky but over all, i cast my vote for the Best Game of ALL TIME on Half Life 2, especially in VR.... Amazing.... cant say enough.

Если есть еще хотя бы один сукин сын, который не прошел этот шедевр, который не облазил весь Интернет в поисках каких-то интересных фактов об сюжете игры - я ему не завидую! Когда я впервые в 2007 году увидел Халфу, я просто офигел, я влюбился в игру, взял у дяди диск, и... понеслась, прошел игру затем еще раз, и еще раз всего я проходил ее около 20-30 раз. Вообщем-то что можно сказать: игра стоит и 10 и 20 баксов, потому что это не просто игра - это мать его БОЖЕСТВО!

Half Life 2 REVIEW
One of the greatest games... An excellent First Person Shooter (FPS) that's what you can hear about this game BUT is it really this good?
So I tried it myself and I can absolutely say: YES, IT IS
Even without cutscenes or big dialoges it has a story. 
The game starts during your arrive in "City 17" after a short appearance of G-man. It continues with meeting some old characters like Barney Calhoun from Black Mesa. 
You're fleeing more or less the whole game from combines, striders, headcrab zombies or more mutants.

The best of Half Life 2 is, I think, that you have to search often the way, discover the levels or find secret places. It's very much fun and it never gets boring. 
The big battles with a rocket launcher or with the machine gun against soldiers are impressive and you can easily forget time in the heat of battle.
Some levels are pretty creepy... for example when you're searching your way through darkness and you hear zombies groaning or you see the figure of G-Man watching you and disappearing.

It's so AWESOME to play it, so it's very hard to describe...There's so much to see, play, fight... 
If you didn't played it yet, just go ahead and play it!!!
